text: Neill Rawlins Sheridan (November 20, 1921 â€“ October 15, 2015), also called Wild Horse was an American professional baseball player. He was born in Sacramento, California and played in the minor leagues from 1943 to 1954. Sheridan played for the Boston Red Sox in 1948. Sheridan died of pneumonia in Antioch, California, aged 93.Obituary ==References== ==Other websites== *Neill Sheridan on Society for American Baseball Research Biography Project Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in California Category:Sportspeople from Sacramento, California
title: Neill Sheridan
